summary: You can find "Barbarian Loincloths" at Bandits
descriptionHtml:
I love sexy bare-chest or chestless armour like [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16167/?]Barbarian Loincloths[/url] by [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/784235]Viltuska[/url][/b]
I want it to appear at Bandits and forsworn by just add to levellist
fur, hide, leather for bandit
tundra, reachman for forsworn

Installation(Manual only)
1.You need to download main file at [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16167/?]Barbarian Loincloths[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16167/?]
[/url]2.Unzip my file and replace BarbarianFur.esp
3.Done

Compatible
May conflict with mod that add same levellist, use TES5Edit can find and solve problem easily.

Thank you [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/784235]Viltuska[/url] for made this mod.
author: Viltuska
